import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import logo from './Img/logo.png' import { useRef } from 'react' function Footer({ scroll }) { const footref = useRef(null); const HscrollIntoView = () => { if(scroll && footref.current) footref.current.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); } useEffect(() => { HscrollIntoView(); }, [HscrollIntoView]) return ( <>
